11.ara-name: كتاب النكاح عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ibn Abbas narrated that :the Prophet said: "The adulteresses are the ones who marry themselves without Bayyinah (proof)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ لاَ نِكَاحَ إِلاَّ بِبَيِّنَةٍ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About: There Is No Marriage Except With Proof (Bayyinah)
